A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Plot holes\, characters introduced and exited without reason\, over reach of fake science even for space opera\, abandonment of entire first trilogy. Why the hell is Yoda even in this? If heroes had listened to Laura Dern everyone would have gotten away. This is forgotten. More plot hole. So when can the Force do all this new stuff? Mark Hamill is great! \n\nA simple question that sums up short comings: Who the hell is Snoke? Apparently\, creators don't know either..
